message.body: Are u picking me up? What's the story? Adam said he'd be there at 8
No, Adam was supposed to work it out with you - he knows what needs to get done. The van is at my house. It's loaded with what you'll need. Call him to see if he plans to drive separate.
I wish someone would let me know this ahead of time. Last I talked to you, we were going to go check it out together
I don't even know where the job is
I told you all this when we went over the schedule when we did your sketch up.
Call me when you have a second.
